verbs.description: Federal prosecutors with the US Attorney 's Office for the Southern District of New York [V: are] investigating whether President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer , Michael Cohen , engaged in illegal lobbying as part of the wide - ranging criminal probe into the attorney .
